text_block_list.name: Street Billboard
text_block_list.text: 『――And that concludes our special about the Oka Sho next week! Upon whose head will the cherry blossom crown shine? Don't miss it!』

text_block_list.name: Passerby A
text_block_list.text: Oh man, I'm really looking forward to it~……! For this distance, won't it be Rhein Kraft? No, Cesario's pretty good too though……!

text_block_list.name: Passerby B
text_block_list.text: And there'll be a bunch of other powerful Uma Musume showing up too-! This year's Tiara generation, who's going to take the lead? ……I really want to know~!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (……the Triple Tiara's first battlefield, 1600m, the 『Oka Sho』. A race where so many Uma Musume have competed using their speed)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (That race with an Uma Musume who was part of an "Impressive Clan"……was amazing. And that speed that Nishino Flower-san showed is still burned in to my memory)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (The Nigawa stage where cherry blossoms dance, the place I've always admired, where many have run before me……but, finally, it's my turn)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: It's my turn to run. ……It's my turn to win!

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text: 『Hi, Mama? ――Wait, let me guess. "Make sure you win the Oka Sho!" That's your message right?』

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text: 『Eh, plus "Have fun"? Ahaa, of course! I've never ever thought of a race as boring!』

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text: 『……Yeah ……Yeah, I said I'll be fine. ……Sorry Mama, I need to get back to training. I'll call you again!』

text_block_list.name: Live Announcer
text_block_list.text: Goal!! It was close, it was an incredibly close 1st place for Rhein Kraft! Rhein Kraft wins the 『Fillies' Review』!!

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text: ――Aaaaaaaaaah!!

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text: (By a head……by just a head! Honestly, I've imagined it so many times! Just one step, with just one more step, if I could have taken that one more step……!)

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text: (『If only』, I know it's meaningless when it comes to races, but! This frustration, this regret, no matter how much I dwell on it――)

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text: All of it! I can turn all of it in to strength……! Haaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Heart's Friend A
text_block_list.text: Heart……s-she's really pushing herself……it's almost like she's possessed. I heard she's been working so hard she's been losing a lot of weight too……

text_block_list.name: Heart's Friend B
text_block_list.text: Yeah……it's more than I could have imagined…… Now it's a little hard to call out to her……

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text: I will win, that's all. The 『Oka Sho』……the first Tiara, I'll be the one to take it……!

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: (Heart-san, Kraft-san, Cesario-san. And the crown that many other indomitable Uma Musume have sought, the Triple Tiara)

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: ――But I won't hand it over. To anyone. The glory of that tiara, never. No matter who.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: Only 3 races. All of them are a once-in-a-lifetime chance. That's why I'll do anything in my power to obtain it……!

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: My goal……my dream. Can only be fulfilled by doing so……!

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: Haa, haaa……!! How was it……!?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: ……――no change.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: The numbers have improved since we've started. However, there have also been some changes input in to the calculations. ……the final result has not changed.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: ……Please, state it more clearly, Shakur-san. I am already prepared.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Tsk…… ……The 『Oka Sho』. Your predicted results are――

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Top 5. ……Victory is not possible.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: ……Thank you very much. If that's what senpai's calculations have resulted in then――that must be true.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: In other words, it'll end in an 『Unfortunate』 result, is what you're saying. ……Just like my mother.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Ha. But things have changed so little, it's almost yawn-inducing. ――You could almost call it the curse of fate, huh?

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: No, it's a blessing. Or perhaps a relief.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: ……Huh?

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: I am already aware of it. The evaluations of others. And that I'm very similar to my mother. Sincerity and a steady disposition――I have nothing that sets me apart.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: And when faced with someone who has something 『Special』, I face defeat. One step away from true glory. ……Because you say it's like that.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: Because I'm so painfully similar, that's why I, that's why only I am able to clear away my mother's regrets. ……I think that's quite convenient.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: ……how stubborn. Or, rather, frank.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: I believe that's also from my mother. Could I ask you to accompany me for just a little bit longer?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: ………………Ahhh-, damnit.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: We're wasting time. Just hurry up and get started. I'll say it now, but I'll be using the data that I collect however I feel like it, got it?

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: Yes, please do! ……Thank you very much, Shakur-san.
And so the days passed――April 10th had arrived, a sunny day where the cherry blossoms danced. The first leg of the Triple Tiara, the 『Oka Sho』, would finally begin.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: The cherry blossom crown, I will be the one to obtain it. Please――watch me.

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Oooooh, they're here, they're here……! Rhein Kraft, Cesario, and Air Messiah! They're getting all the attention aren't they!?

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Yeah, sounds like they're calling it a battle between the 3 strongest! I wonder if one of them will win…… Kuu~ I can't wait~~!!

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text: The 3 strongest, huh……I guess they've really stolen the show, huh. But, in that case――

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text: For the real thing……with my run, I just need to overturn all of that!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Cesario! ……congrats on your first run in your race outfit. It looks really good on you.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: ……Fu. Did you come all the way over here just to tell me that?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Fufuu, nope. ……It does look really good on you though.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: I won't let those sakura petals adorn you. I will win, Cesario.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Now you've said it. ……go ahead and run out in front all you want. In the end, I will undoubtedly catch you.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: It's a showdown, Rhein Kraft. The first tiara――I won't cede it to you!
